description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the insufficient policy enforcement vulnerability in Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based), ensure that you are using the latest version of the browser.

1. Open Microsoft Edge.
2. Click on the three dots (...) located in the upper right corner.
3. Navigate to 'Help and feedback', then 'About Microsoft Edge'.
4. Check for updates. If an update is available, it will be downloaded and installed automatically.
5. Restart the browser once the update is complete to apply changes.

**Details**:
- This update addresses the issue introduced in Chromium versions before 122.0.6261.57, effectively resolving the vulnerability.
- Ensure you are on version 122.0.2365.52 or higher to be protected from this issue. 
- For detailed information on version updates, refer to the [Google Chrome releases](https://chromereleases.googleblog.com/2024). 

**Preconditions**:
- Make sure your device is connected to the internet.
- It’s advisable to close any open tabs and save your work to prevent data loss during the update process.
